page.title: 17Occupations
page.content: We took a census of the different types of job held by people who live in the study area. There are 63 houses of which 2 are holiday homes,2 are unoccupied and 5 in a derelict or semi-derelict condition. Of the 54 occupied houses l6 house retired people.There are a variety of occupations held by the remaining houses. The most common is farming with 7 and teaching with 6.Three people work in the oil industry on the island of Flotta and have to travel a long way to work each day.Aside from the farmers there are six people who own their own businesses not all of which are in the study area. Ola Gorie who has a jewellery manufacturing business in Kirkwall lives here and other local businesses include ditcher, haulier, hotelier, carpenter, hairdresser and garage proprietor.
